com.android.extendedWidgets

Class ImageToggleButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageButton
      • com.android.extendedWidgets.ImageToggleButton

  • public class ImageToggleButton
extends ImageButton
    Extended ImageButton that recognize two additional states: switch on and of.
    Author:
    tomasz
